Articles.Content:
I decided to try out RP-1 and installed it today, however I have encountered a strange error. While loading, KSP will freeze and become unresponsive and I will have to force it to close. From what I can make of the logs (link), there appear to be quite a few errors related to Direct3D: "d3d11: failed to create 2D texture shader resource view id=6053 [D3D error was 80070057]", where the "6053" varies.

The strange thing is, it doesn't always happen at the same place. About 30% of the time, it will occur when MM tries to load its cache, 30% when trying to load textures from Janitor's Closet, and about 30% when trying to load textures for some other mod. The log above is from one of the rare times when it actually progressed all the way to the black screen with the loading icon before the main menu before freezing. I know that RO/RP1 installs with lots of mods can be very slow to load, but even after 15+ minutes the error persisted.

I initially thought that it might be related to my computer specifically, but all my graphics drivers are up to date. Memory does not seem to be an issue either as it doesn't exceed 70% RAM or 75% VRAM.

I will soon be trying an install of RP-1 with only the essential mods but until then, if there is something obvious which I have overlooked which may solve the problem, please let me know.
